title.rendered: Free Webinars for Parents and Guardians

content.rendered:
Our district is excited to support the parents and guardians in our school community during the 2023-2024 school year with a series of free webinars. This webinar series, offered through Zoom, will focus on various aspects of health and wellness. Each live webinar will start at 6:30 p.m.
Please register in advance for each webinar. Each session will be recorded and available for 30 days after the live webinar. If you cannot attend the “live” event, we encourage you to still register to get the link to access the recording.

Past Webinars

You can still sign-up to get a  link to view the recording

October 5, 2023: Skills for a Successful School Year: Organize, Prioritize, and Manage Time.

Presenter: Dr. Jennifer Bashant, Founder of Building Better Futures.

Register to watch the recording. 

October 24, 2023: Special Education: The Basics  Principal

Presenter: Colleen Lester, Educational Consultant and Former Elementary Principal

Register to watch the recording.

November 9, 2023: Avoidance, Obsessions, Perfectionism, and Other Expressions of Anxiety

Presenter: Dr. Jennifer Bashant

Register to watch the recording.

November 28, 2023: Navigating Difficult Conversations with Your Pre/Young Teen

Presenter: Renee Beaulieu, School Improvement Specialist and Parent

Register to watch the recording.

December 7, 2023: Mindfulness-Informed Parenting: Learn the Basics for Introducing Mindfulness Practices to Your Child

Moderator: Dr. Paul Piniero, Assistant Superintendent of Westfield Public Schools, New Jersey

Register to watch the recording.

January 11, 2024: Depression and Suicide: Warning Signs and What You Can Do to Help

Presenter: Dr. Jennifer Bashant

Register to watch the recording.

January 23, 2024: Managing Social Media in Our Lives

Presenter: Dr. Jennifer Bashant

Register to watch the recording.

February 8, 2024: Avoiding Power Struggles, Angry Outbursts, and Other Challenging Behaviors

Presenters: Dr. Jennifer Bashant and Kristen Pidgeon

Register to watch the recording.

February 27, 2024: Making Friends and Keeping Them: 10 Social Skills to Teach Your Child

Presenter: Dr. Jennifer Bashant

Register to watch the recording.

March 21, 2024: It’s an Inside Job: Knowing and Communicating Feelings and Needs

Presenter: Beth DeAngelis, Professor of Social and Emotional Intelligence, Siena College

 

Register to watch the recording
